name: The cool fool in the school
name_original: The cool fool in the school
description:
Try to survive highschool! Even harder, try to finish with good grades, well-behaved but considered to be cool. As in real school, you will hardly know which action brings you forward and which action is foolish. Click on persons to interact. School ends at 3 PM.

All the best!

Game made for Klagenfurt Winter Game Jam 2018

Team: Gretchen (Animations), Vivi (Coding, dialog), Wil (Coding), Sascha (Game testing, presentation), John (Language and idioms)

This game was made with Scratch.

All game assets and code are availabe under a CC-BY-SA 3.0 license at https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/157966704/#editor
